ing: 1 (6 ounce) box Pepperidge FarmÂ® One Step Stuffing Chicken Mix
1 (10.75 ounce) can Campbell'sÂ® Condensed Cream of Mushroom Soup or Campbell'sÂ® Condensed 98% Fat Free Cream of Mushroom Soup
des: "The down-home flavors of tender chicken and Pepperidge FarmÂ® Stuffing are paired with a perfectÂ sauce made with Campbell'sÂ® Condensed Cream of Mushroom Soup and Cheddar cheese."
ins:
Heat butter in medium skillet over medium-high heat.  Add chicken and cook 12 to 15 minutes or until no longer pink.  Remove chicken.
Prepare stuffing in skillet according to package directions except let stand 2 minutes.
Return chicken to skillet.  Mix soup and milk.  Pour over chicken.  Sprinkle with cheese.  Cover and heat through.
